response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product for $12,500. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity to secure such an asset at a favorable rate. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with this outstanding product. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12500}
